name: Surround Them!
description:
CONTROL Use mouse to start the game and then arrow to drive your ship.  The start may be hurry  (sorry)

Here is surround them !

A rather arcade game where you have to surround your enemies to get rid of them. But beware that your mega-Ultimate lasso of death must not however hit the planets full of peaceful life.
 
Don't hesitate to suggest improvements - that's how one learns!
